column4: restart amarok at least. what kind of files are you trying to play?
Click Applications  Add/Remove. In the top right, change the setting to All available applications. Then select Other in the left panel and then select the Ubuntu restricted extras package. Click OK.
I tried what you said and that didn't seem to do it.  Do I need a restart?
yeah restart amarok. if not make sure it uses the xine engine. go to configuration-engine
